articles.description: Britain's Emma Raducanu says a string of encouraging performances at Wimbledon have made her "hungry" to continue moving up the rankings.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu says Wimbledon 2024 run has "fuelled the fire"

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton has had to wait for it, but he finally has his moment of redemption at the British Grand Prix.
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton wins British Grand Prix and says he thought it was never going to happen again

articles.description: Novak Djokovic says he expects "fireworks on court" when he takes on Holger Rune for a place in the Wimbledon quarter-finals on Monday.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024: Novak Djokovic 'expects fireworks' against Holger Rune

articles.description: Bayern Munich sign winger Michael Olise from Crystal Palace after paying a release clause worth about £60m.
articles.title: Michael Olise: Bayern Munich sign Crystal Palace winger

articles.description: France suspend Melvyn Jaminet after he posted a video on social media with a racist comment.
articles.title: Melvyn Jaminet: France suspend full-back for racist comment in social media video

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz holds off a late charge from 16th seed Ugo Humbert to win 6-3 6-4 1-6 7-5 to move into the last eight at Wimbledon.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 results: Carlos Alcaraz continues title defence with hard-fought win over Ugo Humbert

articles.description: Italian Jasmine Paolini secures her place in the Wimbledon quarter-finals for the first time after Madison Keys retires with an injury in the deciding set.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 results: Jasmine Paolini through after Madison Keys injury

articles.description: Britain's Tom Pidcock is pipped on the line as France's Anthony Turgis wins stage nine of the Tour de France.
articles.title: Tour de France: Tom Pidcock pipped & Tadej Pogacar retains yellow

articles.description: Laura Muir sets a new British women's 1500m record as Faith Kipyegon and Yaroslava Mahuchikh both break world records at the Paris Diamond League.
articles.title: Paris Diamond League: Laura Muir breaks British 1500m record as world records fall in Paris
